extendedInfo.description: JaffWorld TheSeries: JAFFâDeath & Lifeâ¨      The 1st in a series of Fantasy books by Tyler J Kriegel.  JAFF is a NEW action adventure fantasy book series. You will be drawn in to the continuing story line as you meet the growing cast of characters. They each discover their own "SPECIAL" powers and how to use them to fight EVIL.     Not yet available in the book stores, you can now order your personally autographed 1st edition of JAFF â Death & Life today.  JAFF, features several NEW and unique characters and their adventures. The main characters possess amazing and supernatural powers. The press run was limited specifically for "SPECIAL" collectors of this Fantasy/SciFi genre. Each copy is personally dated and autographed by the author, Tyler J. Kriegel, who penned this classic fantasy masterpiece at the age of 17. Make sure you include in your special notes to whom the book shall be made out to and watch out for the next in the series of JAFF. At $12.00 plus the price of shipping this first edition it will make a great impression on your friends when you are the first, and maybe only, one to get a copy.

reviews.comment: Fantastic new book. I loved the characters. A must read for anime fans. Order the book. 1st in the series.Watch for the 2nd book.JAFF-Sin & Redemption
